bullets: Actively participated in client meetings to gather requirements, discuss project scope, and provide suggestions
Efficiently analyzed, understood, and worked with existing codebases to meet client needs
Developed a custom WordPress theme for a major media company. Identified and resolved bugs and issues in the codebase, both independently and through pair programming
Developed and implemented new features based on client requirements, collaborating with the team
Full-stack development for a live streaming website
Led a team of interns, assigning tasks and reviewing code

Contributed ideas for new features to enhance the website's functionality
Worked on both frontend and backend development using Angular and PHP
